DataGroupDefinition.Name: Food recipes
DataGroupDefinition.Description: Recipe data to specify the ingredients of foods. Food recipes can be used to describe the ingredients of a composite food (e.g., of apple pie), or to specify the amount of a primary ingredient needed to obtain 100g of the food (e.g., grapes to raisins). Recipe is commonly used recursively (e.g., apple pie contains apple and flour, flour contains wheat).
